metadata.name: #1 Liquid Poet
metadata.description:
' Liquid poet '

+this draft is the first approach to a future NFT collection about Fernando Pessoa and his heteronyms.+

" among the best Portuguese poets of all times, Fernando Pessoa was 3 or 4..."

...
I shall always be the one who was not born for that;
I shall always be only the one who had (good) qualities;
I shall always be the one who waited for the door to be opened on a doorless wall,
And sang the song of the Infinite in a chicken-coop,
And heard the voice of God inside a plugged well.
...

* draft series #1
